title: ETF announces grant for members’ children
paragraphs: The Employee Trust Fund Board (ETFB) has announced its decision to grant financial assistance for the children of ETF members who have passed the GCE Advanced Level (A/L) 2020 examinations.
The assistance is aimed at helping the recently passed out students continue their educational activities.
The ETFB shared in its website that a grant of Rs.12,000 will be given for each child. A total of 5,000 children will receive financial assistance.
To facilitate the grant, the ETFB has called for applications for those seeking assistance, which should reach the Board via registered post on or before 31 July 2021.
